ComicInfo.Summary:
After the shocking events of last issue, Wade Wilson is out for revenge...
...and nobody dishes out revenge quite like the Merc With a Mouth.
Especially when he's slicin' and dicin' a bunch of assassins who took away someone he cares about.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Mark Bagley, John Dell & Val Staples | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | John Tyler Christopher | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:15:31. [CVDB682650]
ComicInfo.Inker: Cam Smith, John Dell, Scott Hanna
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: John Dell, John Tyler Christopher, Mark Bagley
